about_the_game:
WELCOME LILITH

Age: 21 years old

Zodiac Sign: Capricorn

Preferences: Eastern martial arts and sexual practices, knife-play, bondage.

Lilith is a woman of her word and honor above all. She doesn't make promises lightly and is usually quite reserved. Raised as a warrior, she embodies the essence of her training — dedicated, resilient, and unwavering in her principles, sometimes to a fault.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

From now on, Lilith will become not only your honorable companion but your unwavering muse! Lilith will always keep you company on the main screen with her graceful animations and resolute dialogues.

By purchasing this DLC, you get the Lilith mascot! You can switch your mascot at any time by opening your profile and choosing the "Mascot" tab.

Along with the mascot, you're getting 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

But most importantly, you're getting our undying gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Lilith
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Lilith, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
